short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 新一代在线录屏演示工具

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
新简录屏：我们支持人像模式的屏幕录制，适合团队、销售、电商、在线课堂等各种类型场景！并且提供超长的使用时长，以及几乎无限的存储空间！而这些目前仅需要您现在安装插件即可享用，无需付费以及更多繁琐的订阅操作！

我们的核心产品功能：
- 流畅使用，一键开始：支持一键录制、分享、评论，最大化降低操作复杂程度；
- 云端录制，内存无忧：无需担心本地内存，支持边录边穿、断点续录等功能，随时找回已录制的内容
- 自由水印，谨防盗版：录制后视频无水印，可根据需求自由添加水印、自定义水印样式；
- 多种样式，快速标注：支持文字、画笔两种模式，可以自由输入文字，并在网页上任意位置进行画笔标注；
- 异步协作，加速理解：通过视频+文本内容的快速传递，可以让您的协作方更加清晰、快捷的定位到问题，并修复问题，节省宝贵的工作时间；

我们的主要应用场景：
- 在线电商：便捷的录屏讲解，可以拉进您与客户距离，避免因为文字沟通不清晰而产生的投诉、退款；
- 产品开发：在异步交流工作中提供更加顺畅的产品需求反馈，消除无尽会议带来的冗长时间浪费；
- 市场销售：让您的每次客户接触都变得真实有力，且可获得最真实的观看反馈；
- 在线课堂：方便授课人快速路至讲解课程内容，并且支持多种样式标注重点，学生们可以更加专注理解知识；
- 在线直播：快速将直播精彩时刻录制下来，迅速传播到其他媒体

关于新简：
新简是由新片场团队倾力打造的在线视频制作工具，帮助用户无需下载软件，在线进行录屏、视频剪辑、视频去水印、视频压缩、视频转格式、视频加字幕等一系列工作，并且视频直接在线存储，随时随地实时访问，实时分享给其他同伴，完美解决云端在线办公场景需求。

我们将不断努力，不断开发更多功能，让大家的使用更加便捷高效。

Xinjian recording screen: We support screen recording in portrait mode, suitable for various types of scenes such as team, sales, e-commerce, online classroom, etc.! And provide super long usage time, and almost unlimited storage space! And these currently only require you to install the plug-in now, no need to pay and more cumbersome subscription operations!

Our core product features:
- Smooth use, one-click start: support one-click recording, sharing, commenting, and minimize the complexity of operations;
- Cloud recording, worry-free memory: no need to worry about local memory, support functions such as recording while recording, continuous recording at breakpoints, etc., to retrieve the recorded content at any time
- Free watermark, beware of piracy: there is no watermark in the video after recording, and you can freely add a watermark and customize the watermark style according to your needs;
- A variety of styles, quick annotation: support two modes of text and brush, you can freely enter text and make brush annotations at any position on the web page;
- Asynchronous collaboration to accelerate understanding: through the rapid transmission of video + text content, your collaborators can locate and fix problems more clearly and quickly, saving valuable work time;

Our main application scenarios:
- Online e-commerce: convenient screen recording explanations can bring you closer to your customers and avoid complaints and refunds due to unclear text communication;
- Product development: Provide smoother feedback on product requirements in asynchronous communication work, eliminating the long and wasteful time caused by endless meetings;
- Marketing: Make every contact with your customers real and powerful, and get the most authentic viewing feedback;
- Online classroom: It is convenient for the instructor to quickly go to explain the content of the course, and supports a variety of styles to mark key points, so that students can focus more on understanding knowledge;
- Online live broadcast: Quickly record the wonderful moments of live broadcast and quickly spread to other media

About Xinjian:
Xinjian is an online video production tool created by the new studio team, which helps users to perform a series of tasks such as screen recording, video editing, video watermarking, video compression, video conversion, and video subtitles online without downloading software. Video is directly stored online, accessed in real time anytime, anywhere, and shared with other partners in real time, which perfectly solves the needs of cloud online office scenarios.

We will continue to work hard to develop more functions to make your use more convenient and efficient.
